sentences.pinyin: yīdàn yǒu wèntí, qǐng gàosu wǒ.
sentences.translation: Once there is a problem, please tell me.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我们必须安排计划，以防万一，一旦出现意外的情况，我们能够应对。
sentences.traditionalText: 我們必須安排計劃，以防萬一，一旦出現意外的情況，我們能夠應對。
sentences.pinyin: wǒmen bìxū ānpái jìhuà, yǐfáng wànyī, yīdàn chūxiàn yìwài de qíngkuàng, wǒmen nénggòu yìngduì.
sentences.translation: We must plan ahead, in case, if there happens to be a sudden situation, we would be able to cope with it.

sentences.pinyin: Yīdàn tā zǒu, tā jiù kū le.

sentences.simplifiedText: 一旦你明白了这个道理，你的人生就会有所改变。
sentences.traditionalText: 一旦你明白了這個道理，你的人生就會有所改變。
sentences.pinyin: Yīdàn nǐ míngbái le zhège dàolǐ, nǐ de rénshēng jiù huì yǒusuǒ gǎibiàn.
sentences.translation: Once you understand this principle, your life will change.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他一旦决定了，就不会改变。
sentences.traditionalText: 他一旦決定了，就不會改變。
sentences.pinyin: Tā yīdàn juédìngle, jiù bù huì gǎibiàn.
sentences.translation: Once he has made a decision, he won't change it.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他一旦决定了，就会用各种方法来实现他的目标。
sentences.traditionalText: 他一旦決定了，就會用各種方法來實現他的目標。
sentences.pinyin: Tā yīdàn juédìngle, jiù huì yòng gè zhǒng fāngfǎ lái shíxiàn tā de mùbiāo.
sentences.translation: Once he has made a decision, he will use various methods to achieve his goal.
